THE FAMILY CODE OF THE PHILIPPINESREPUBLIC ACT NO. 9255 - AN ACT ALLOWING ILLEGITIMATE CHILDREN TO USE THE SURNAME OF THEIR FATHER, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE ARTICLE 176 OF EXECUTIVE ORDER NO. 209, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "FAMILY CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES"REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8533 -
